constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 58 (Monday, March 29, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. KAPTUR:
H.R. 2279.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section VIII, To make Rules for the Government
Article I, Section VIII, To regulate Commerce
Article I, Section VIII, To make all Laws which shall be
necessary and proper
[Page H1699]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Consumer Protection and Commerce.

title: Office of Manufacturing and Industrial Innovation Policy Act of 2021
